dct_description_sm: Mounted cover title. Copperplate print. In Japanese. Oriented with north to the upper right. Relief shown by hachures. Includes 6 insets, address chart and distance chart. Includes preface and legend. Includes list of mileage, rivers and district names. 1 map; 106 x 145 cm., folded in cover 25 x 19 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
